name: Project: Virulence
description:
Protect the heart pillar from the attacking monsters!

Use the blood points to build towers and upgrade them. Defeat enemies to earn blood points, and buy more tower slots from the pillar!

This game was made for the 72 hour jam!

Controls:

WASD - pan the camera

Scroll wheel - zoom in/out

Clicking on the tower nodes/pillar for their menus
